DOC.brief_summary: Interferential electrical stimulation ( IES ) increase local blood flow . It know whether increase blood flow may cause inhibition sympathetic activity , mediate muscle metaboreflex activity . The purpose study evaluate effect IES metaboreflex activation healthy subject .
DOC.brief_title: Interferential Electrical Stimulation Vasodilatation Healthy Individuals
DOC.detailed_description: The study sample consist 11 healthy young individual . All subject non-smokers , non-obese free sign symptom disease , reveal medical history , physical examination electrocardiogram rest cardiopulmonary exercise testing . Exclusion criterion pregnancy , breast-feeding , alcohol drug abuse , medication potential effect cardiovascular variable . Subjects ask drink caffeine-containing drink exercise least 12 48 hour , respectively , experimental protocol .
DOC.criteria: Subjects nonsmoker nonobese free sign symptom disease Pregnancy breastfeed alcohol drug abuse medication potential effect cardiovascular variable
